fields.name: FizzBuzz Frenzy
fields.description: A math-based game where players shout "Fizz" for multiples of 3, "Buzz" for multiples of 5, and "FizzBuzz" for multiples of both.
fields.rules:
Players take turns counting up from 1.
Replace multiples of 3 with "Fizz".
Replace multiples of 5 with "Buzz".
Replace multiples of 3 and 5 with "FizzBuzz".
First to make a mistake loses.

fields.name: Sock Match Showdown
fields.description: A fast-paced sorting game where players match pairs of socks from a giant pile.
fields.rules:
Players race to match the most pairs in 2 minutes.
Points are deducted for mismatched pairs.
Bonus points are awarded for finding rare socks (e.g., "rainbow socks").

fields.name: Pillow Fortress Battle
fields.description: A strategic game where players build pillow forts and try to knock down their opponents' forts.
fields.rules:
Players have 10 minutes to build a fort using pillows.
Take turns throwing soft projectiles to knock down the opponentâ€™s fort.
The winner is the last player with a standing fort.
